name: world-tester
description: AI-powered QA tester â€” monorepo with agent service and web frontend

scripts.release: AGENT_MODE=server VNC=true docker compose down && AGENT_MODE=server VNC=true docker compose up --build -d
scripts.release:interactive:vnc: (while ! nc -z localhost 5900 2>/dev/null; do sleep 1; done && npm run vnc) & VNC=true docker compose run --rm --build --service-ports agent
scripts.vnc: command -v vncviewer >/dev/null 2>&1 && vncviewer localhost:5900 || echo 'vncviewer not found. Install it: sudo apt install tigervnc-viewer'
scripts.postinstall: npm run db:generate -w @world-tester/agent 2>/dev/null; npx -w @world-tester/agent playwright install chromium 2>/dev/null; true
